error.Error 3: Motorized element not connected to the motor output.
error.Error 5: Temperature probe in open circuit (zone sensor disconnected).
error.Error 6: Temperature probe in short circuit (zone sensor shorted).
error.Error 7: Incompatible element (device or module not supported by the system).
error.Error 8: Lite thermostat not found (no communication with the zone thermostat).
error.F05-H: Heating battery temperature probe open (open circuit).
error.F05-C: Cooling battery temperature probe open (open circuit).
error.F06-H: Heating battery temperature probe in short circuit.
error.F06-C: Cooling battery temperature probe in short circuit.
error.IU error IU4: Indoor unit error (U4 – no communication between indoor and outdoor units).
error.Error IAQ1: Loss of communication between the controller and its AirQ module (ionization).
error.Error IAQ2: Loss of communication between Airzone particle sensor and controller.
error.Error IAQ3: Zone module with ionizer not connected (zone ionizer not detected).
error.Error IAQ4: Motor connected directly without ionizer (incorrect connection in ionization output).
error.Error 9: Loss of communication between the Airzone gateway and the system.
error.Error 11: Loss of communication between the gateway and the indoor unit.
error.Error 13: Communication failure between the main controller and radiant elements control module.
error.Error 15: Loss of communication with the energy measurement module.
error.Error 16: Energy consumption reading out of range or invalid.
error.Error C09: Communication failure between aerothermal gateway and production control center.
error.Error C11: Communication failure between aerothermal gateway and indoor unit/hydrokit.
error.machineready_error: The air conditioning unit is in an error state or not available for control.
